What Exactly Does This Generator Do?

Our R6 Credits Generator is one of the only ones out there where you won’t have to complete a “survey”. The way that this generator works is that you go to the generator, SELECT THE DESIRED AMOUNT OF R6 CREDITS YOU WANT, and then we will fetch it for you. Before the r6 credits is valid you need to complete the sponsor offer that pops up. This is necessary because it’s actually what pays for your R6 Credits, and it’s the reason why we’re able to provide this service for free. But don’t worry. It only takes a few minutes from when you go to the generator til you end up with the code in your hands. 

Go To : http://appfox.org/r6s How To Use The Free R6 Credits Generator

1- Click the “Claim Your Free R6 Credits” button above.
2- Select the amount you want.
3- Click “Next”.
4- Click “Verify”.
5- Complete the short offer to activate the R6 Credits.

Compatibility

The generator is compatible with all devices. We used to only support Windows, but now we have developed the tool so that it should be accessible from all devices that have an internet browser and obviously an internet connection. This means that this tool is very convenient. A compatibility error should not be possible, but if you end up with some errors or something doesn’t work then please drop us a message through our contact form on our contact us page.
